snippet: An instructor and eight students from various walks of life and ages were remembered as an Oregon community tried to come to grips with a mass shooting.
abstract: Nine victims of Umpqua Community College shootings in Roseburg, Ore, profiled.

byline.original: By CLAIRE CAIN MILLER, DAVE PHILIPPS and JULIE TURKEWITZ
byline.contributor: Claire Cain Miller reported from Roseburg, Dave Philipps from New York and Julie Turkewitz from Denver. Reporting was contributed by Dirk VanderHart and Jack Healy from Roseburg, Jess Bidgood from Boston, and Stephen Farrell and Liam Stack from New York.

lead_paragraph: An instructor and eight students from various walks of life and ages were remembered as an Oregon community tried to come to grips with a mass shooting.

headline.main: A Snapshot of Students Lost: Young and Old, but All Striving
headline.print_headline: A Snapshot of Students Lost: Young and Old, but All Striving
